overview:
With over 25 years of sales, business development and corporate development experience, Craig serves as our Chief Executive Officer.

Craig spent many years in the direct marketing industry where he learned that targeted communications coupled with personalized messaging was a powerful way to cut through the clutter of mass communications.

When Craig was introduced to the Web with the advent of the first Mosaic Browser in early 1994, he immediately felt that the future of direct marketing was going to be shifted to the Web. He never imagined just how quickly and how far reaching the Web would change, not just the dynamics of direct marketing but business in general and communications as a whole.

Once hooked, Craig went on to help build two successful Web consulting and development firms, Poppe Tyson and US Interactive. As the head of business development at both and later corporate development at US Interactive, Craig played an integral role in introducing this new medium into the boardrooms of several of the worldâ€™s leading companies like; IBM, Dean Witter, Chase Bank, Johnson & Johnson, Mellon Bank, ING Barings, Priceline, Lending Tree and several others.

Craig also was a contributing author to the book; Mastering Web Design, which was a compendium of thought leaders in the early days of the Web covering everything from design, marketing and business strategy.
